column5: We will help you to achieve your ambitions, from advancing your career in business development to running your own start up.Entrepreneurial and innovation skills are increasingly sought after by employers who want their teams to take advantage of new opportunities. On this course you will learn to design, develop and run your own innovation-driven business. Develop your understanding of organisations, their management and the changing contexts they operate in.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 2 years full time with year in industry
